summary: A treasure map in four pieces, the ghost of a hanged pirate, a talking parrot, and a ship full of red herrings complicate Charlie's search for a murderer on board a docked ship.
cast: Sidney Toler|Sheila Ryan|Robert Weldon|Victor Sen Yung|Donald Douglas|Kay Aldridge|Paul McGrath|George Reeves|Truman Bradley|Ethel Griffies|Lenita Lane|Milton Parsons|Stanley Andrews|Jimmy Aubrey|Ralph Dunn|Pat Flaherty|Lee Tung Foo|Oscar 'Dutch' Hendrian|Paul Kruger|Lee Phelps|Tim Ryan|Brick Sullivan|Charles Tannen|John Wallace
title: Dead Men Tell
